qas.question: More than what percentage of the students surveyed said they'd been bullied?
About how many pupils took the bullying survey?
What specific form of bullying did the survey show was most common?
What was the second most common form of bullying experienced by boys who took the survey?

context: Over <a0_0>40<a0_0/> per cent of school pupils in the city that responded to a survey claimed to have been the victim of bullying. More than <a1_0>2,000<a1_0/> took part and said that <a2_0>verbal<a2_0/> bullying was the most common form, although <a3_0>physical<a3_0/> bullying was a close second for boys.
